field.name: Item %1%, Count
field.description: Number of objects in Item %1%. If not provided, it is assumed Item %1% consists of only one object.

field.name: Item %1%, Value
field.description: An optional value given to each object in Item %1%. The unit must contain the currency of the value, according to ISO 4217.

parameter.name: Remove Item
parameter.description: Removes an item from the contents list.

parameter.name: Item Description
parameter.description: Sets a description for an item to create.

parameter.name: Item Code
parameter.description: Sets a code for an item to create.

parameter.name: Item Value
parameter.description: Sets a value for an item to create.

parameter.name: Item Currency
parameter.description: Sets a currency for an item to create.

parameter.name: Item Count
parameter.description: Sets an item count for an item to create.

parameter.name: Add Item
parameter.description: If true, adds the current item to the contents list, if parameters have been set correctly. After adding the item to the list, all parameters for the current item are cleared.

parameter.name: Clear Items
parameter.description: If true, removes all items in the list.

controlParameters.comment:
The following control parameters must be grouped in control forms:
* `Item Description` * `Item Code` * `Item Value` * `Item Currency` * `Item Count` * `Add Item`
